about_the_game:
Foresight Official Soundtrack

Re-live your battles in Foresight with the Official Sound Track! In it you'll find 38 tracks, out of which 2 of them are bonus tracks composed alongside the suite to help define the theme and mood of a post nuclear war Earth.

As we transition the OST from a DLC to a Music item, players are no longer required to purchase the base game in order to own this OST! Last thing to note: The quality of the OST is higher than those played in the actual game.

Thanks again for your support!
Foresight Team
